questions.question: Where should the joke be placed in the README?
options: After the Quick Start section (around line 11) - early in the document for immediate engagement
At the end of the README (after line 258) - as a closing/footer joke that doesn't interrupt technical content
In the Key Features section - perhaps as a humorous feature point

questions.question: What tone should the joke have?
options: Programming/developer humor (e.g., a dad joke about code, debugging, or git)
PostHog-specific humor (e.g., a joke about analytics or product tracking)
